Description: Black-topped vase with small flat base, rounded sides and raised roll rim made of Nile silt pottery, with fine burnished red slip, blackened at rim and upper body.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Curator's comments: Marked 1594 on base Like Black-top red ware B68a in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery.
